Clank!.name: Clank!
Clank!.description: A deck-building adventure game where players explore a dungeon, collect treasures, and avoid the dragon's wrath.

It's a Wonderful World.name: It's a Wonderful World
It's a Wonderful World.description: A card drafting and engine-building game set in a futuristic world where players compete to build the most prosperous empire.

Smallworld.name: Smallworld
Smallworld.description: A fantasy-themed board game where players vie for control of a world that is simply too small to accommodate them all.

Roll for the Galaxy.name: Roll for the Galaxy
Roll for the Galaxy.description: A dice game of space empire building where players roll dice to develop new technologies, settle worlds, and produce goods.
